summary: A command‑line utility that evaluates CTC and hybrid RNNT‑CTC speech‑recognition models using greedy decoding, optionally incorporating a context‑biasing graph derived from a user‑supplied list and performing grid‑search over decoding thresholds and weighting parameters, then writes transcriptions and performance metrics.
business_intent: Enable developers and data scientists to quickly assess and fine‑tune ASR models for domain‑specific vocabularies, improving recognition accuracy and facilitating integration of contextual biasing into speech applications.
